name: Brenda A. SCHOFIELD v. Richard W. SCHOFIELD

parties: Brenda A. SCHOFIELD v. Richard W. SCHOFIELD.

opinions.text:
ORDER
The petition for writ of certiorari and request for stay are denied.

attorneys: Louis J. Saccoccio, Providence, for plaintiff-respondent.
Joseph E. Marran, Jr., Pawtucket, for defendant-petitioner.
casebody.head_matter:
Brenda A. SCHOFIELD v. Richard W. SCHOFIELD.
No. 80-190-M.P.
Supreme Court of Rhode Island.
April 24, 1980.
Louis J. Saccoccio, Providence, for plaintiff-respondent.
Joseph E. Marran, Jr., Pawtucket, for defendant-petitioner.
